title: why can't I move junk email to inbox?
content: I find emails in my junk mail that are marked junk and they are not junk. When I try to move them to inbox - it does not let me move them to the inbox when I right click and choose move. I am using thunderbird on an iMac. Why does this happen? How can I move junk mail to my inbox?
creator: susanlessick

title: Where to find "Get Message"?
content: On T-Bird 102.12.0 I am unable to find "Get Message"
